name: M.I.Helper
body:
### Project Description
Human Robot Interaction project is made with purpose of integrating robots in daily life, but to make it useful and productive. The project is made for museum visitors in order to increase interest among them and help to learn something new. 
Combination of Microsoft Kinect and Humanoid Robot Nao can help museum visitors with orientation within a facility, so people get useful information about exhibit in time.

### Project Technologies and Hardware to be used
Microsoft Kinect - device which is able to recognize human and also enables users to control and interact with different device without using any remote controls, but through a natural user interface using gestures and spoken commands. Humanoid Robot Nao - robot prototype with a variety of hardware devices installed, such as sensors, audio input and output, cameras and etc, which make interaction with robot easier and attractive.

### Authors of the project
Saida Mussakhojayeva, Yerlik Agzhanov, Madi Zhanbyrtayev. 

School of Science and Technology at Nazarbayev University.
